message.content:
Dear [Name],
Here is a healthy meal plan for you for the next seven days that fits your dietary restrictions. Each day's meals are designed to provide balanced nutrition with a combination of proteins, carbohydrates, fats, vitamins, and minerals. You can also adjust the portions based on your calorie needs or preferences.
Please note that this meal plan is just an example, and you may need to make some modifications based on your individual preferences and dietary requirements. If you have any questions or concerns, please consult a registered dietitian or your healthcare provider.
Meal Plan for 7 Days:
Monday
Breakfast: Blueberry oatmeal smoothie with almond milk (1 cup) and protein powder (1 scoop).
Lunch: Quinoa salad with chickpeas, cucumber, tomatoes, and feta cheese.
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, and potatoes) and brown rice.
Snack: Fruit smoothie with almond milk (1 cup) and protein powder (1 scoop).
Tuesday
Breakfast: Omelet with bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and turkey bacon (2 slices).
Lunch: Lettuce wraps with chicken, carrots, cucumber, and almond butter.
Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, and potatoes) and brown rice.
Snack: Trail mix with walnuts, raisins, and pumpkin seeds.
Wednesday
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach and turkey bacon (2 slices).
Lunch: Chicken salad with celery, apples, grapes, and almonds.
Dinner: Turkey burger with sautéed vegetables and whole wheat bun.
Snack: Yogurt parfait with vanilla yogurt (1/2 cup) and berries.
Thursday
Breakfast: Breakfast burrito with scrambled eggs, onions, peppers, salsa, and avocado.
Lunch: Quinoa bowl with edamame, cucumber, tomatoes, and feta cheese.
Dinner: Salmon kabob with zucchini, squash, and red onion skewered together.
Snack: Fruit salad with cantaloupe, honeydew, blueberries, and strawberries.
Friday
Breakfast: Oatmeal with almond milk (1/2 cup), chia seeds (1 tbsp), and berries.
Lunch: Tuna salad with celery, carrots, and bell peppers.
Dinner: Grilled tofu with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, and potatoes) and brown rice.
Snack: Trail mix with walnuts, raisins, and pumpkin seeds.
Saturday
Breakfast: Egg white omelet with peppers, onions, mushrooms, and turkey bacon (2 slices).
Lunch: Lettuce wraps with chicken, carrots, cucumber, and almond butter.
Dinner: Turkey burger with sautéed vegetables and whole wheat bun.
Snack: Yogurt parfait with vanilla yogurt (1/2 cup) and berries.
Sunday
Breakfast: Scrambled eggs with spinach, tomatoes, and turkey bacon (2 slices).
Lunch: Chicken salad with celery, apples, grapes, and almonds.
Dinner: Grilled salmon with roasted vegetables (broccoli, carrots, and potatoes) and brown rice.
Snack: Trail mix with walnuts, raisins, and pumpkin seeds.
